Manually adapted response from the req.sh call:
- Removes all response lines.
- Eval count set to 0.
- Context set to empty array.
-- req.sh --
curl -v -X POST http://localhost:11434/api/generate -d '{
"model": "llama3.2:1b",
"prompt": "tell me a joke",
"stream": false
}'
-- response.json --
